name: K-Chain
description: K-Chain Tech Inc. is a professional global e-commerce platform service to expand the global market for century- old branded products. The century-old global culture can be passed on to every corner of the world, and century- old products exist in every region of the world to realize this vision, we will actively build the blockchain, payment systems, logistics centers, e-commerce platforms, digital multimedia, and community operations. By designing a safe, efficient, and entertaining e-commerce platform, bring people a brand-new e- commerce experience and continue to preserve the knowledge and achievements of the world for a century.
